text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	FILE_NAME = ',concat('''',pipeline().parameters.fileName,''''),',
	FILE_NAME_SYNC = ',concat('''',pipeline().parameters.fileNameSync,''''),',
	FILE_PATH = ''',pipeline().parameters.MovePath,''',
	STATUS = ''P''
	WHERE DATA_ID =',pipeline().parameters.dataId,';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_RESPONSE_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''P''
	WHERE RES_ID =',pipeline().parameters.resId,';')

	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	FILE_NAME = ',concat('''',pipeline().parameters.fileName,''''),',
	FILE_PATH = ''',pipeline().parameters.MovePath,''',
	STATUS = ''S'',

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_RESPONSE_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''S'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''Move file success''
	WHERE RES_ID =',pipeline().parameters.resId,';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	FILE_NAME = ',concat('''',pipeline().parameters.fileName,''''),',
	FILE_NAME_SYNC = ',concat('''',pipeline().parameters.fileNameSync,''''),',

	STATUS = ''P''
	WHERE DATA_ID =',pipeline().parameters.dataId,';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_RESPONSE_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''',if(or(empty(pipeline().parameters.fileNameOnly),empty(pipeline().parameters.fileNameSyncOnly)),'E','P'),''',
	DESCRIPTION = ',if(or(empty(pipeline().parameters.fileNameOnly),empty(pipeline().parameters.fileNameSyncOnly)),concat('''','File name or file sync data not found',''''),'NULL'),'
	WHERE RES_ID =',pipeline().parameters.resId,';')

activities.name: Update RESPONSE_FILE not have input file_copy1

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_RESPONSE_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''P'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''Query response detail ',string(pipeline().parameters.countRecord),' record'' WHERE RES_ID =',pipeline().parameters.resId,';')

dependsOn.activity: Update RESPONSE_FILE not have input file_copy1

text.value:
@concat('DELETE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL
        WHERE FILE_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.fileId,'')

@concat('DELETE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE
        WHERE FILE_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.fileId,'')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_RESPONSE_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''S'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''Query response detail ',string(pipeline().parameters.countRecord),' record | create file ',pipeline().parameters.fileName,' in path ',pipeline().parameters.outputPath,' complete'' WHERE RES_ID =',pipeline().parameters.resId,';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_RESPONSE_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''E'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',substring(concat('Datafactory Exception :',replace(activity('create file output').Error.Message,'''','"')),0,if(less(length(replace(activity('create file output').Error.Message,'''','"')),499),length(replace(activity('create file output').Error.Message,'''','"')),499)),''' WHERE RES_ID =',pipeline().parameters.resId,';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_RESPONSE_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''E'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',substring(concat('Datafactory Exception :',replace(activity('create file output archive').Error.Message,'''','"')),0,if(less(length(replace(activity('create file output archive').Error.Message,'''','"')),499),length(replace(activity('create file output archive').Error.Message,'''','"')),499)),''' WHERE RES_ID =',pipeline().parameters.resId,';')
